name: Piggy Bank - Coin Clicker 1.1
description:
This is a "Cookie Clicker" clone, but, instead of cookies, you put your savings aside, coin by coin, inside a Piggy Bank (and more).

The items in the shop will be unlocked as you progress through the game, in fact in the screenshot you can only see a really small initial portion (to avoid spoilers on what it will unlock).

2 available versions: Android (original version updated) and Windows (new adapted version).

Multi-language support (as you can also see from the options screenshot):
English, Italiano, Español, Français, Deutsch, Português, Polski, Українська, Nederlands, 日本
